constructor.details: Initializes the contract setting the provided address as the initial magistrate.

magistrate().details: Returns the address of the current magistrate.

transferMagistrate(address).details: Transfers magistrate of the contract to a new account (`newMagistrate`). Can only be called by the current magistrate.

 The only thing changed is the removal of `renounceOwnership()` function and name of the variables.
